summary: ABS PUMP CONTINUES TO RUN AFTER IGNITION IS TURNED OFF. I CALLED NORMAN FREDE CHEVROLET IN HOUSTON TEXAS AND THE SERVICE TECHNICIAN TOLD ME TO TAKE THE 60 AMP FUSE OUT FROM THE DISTRIBUTION CENTER UNDER THE HOOD AND BRING IT IN. HE ALSO TOLD ME THAT THIS IS A $600.00 PART ALONE. HE SAID THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH 1999 SILVERADOS. IF ITS SO COMMON, HOW COME THERE ISN'T A RECALL ON THIS YET. IT STILL ISN'T FIXED.
